description:
Filmmaker Christopher Nolan is known for a number of complex Hollywood blockbusters. He’s tackled superhero films, sci-fi epics, and historical biopics. Now, however, Christopher Nolan confirms that he’d love to tackle a different genre entirely: horror. The horror genre is often considered to be a lesser genre by certain critics. Of course, horror fans know [...]

The post Christopher Nolan Wants To Make A Horror Movie appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Christopher Nolan Wants To Make A Horror Movie
